name: Chicken Paprikas Over Egg Noodles
recipeIngredient: 2 large onions, peeled, halved and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-low heat. Add the onions and cook until very soft, about 15 minutes. Sprinkle the paprika over the onions and continue cooking for 5 minutes. Stir in the fowl glaze and cook 5 minutes. Add the peas and cook until heated through, about 2 minutes.

Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add the noodles and cook until tender, about 8 minutes. Drain. Remove the onion mixture from the heat and whisk in the yogurt. Stir in the salt and pepper to taste. Divide the noodles among 4 plates. Spoon the paprikas over the noodles and serve immediately.
